title: Not possible to change the pose of heightmaps

content.raw:
It seems that pose is ignored for heightmaps both when using include tags, or inside the model tag. Two examples which fail to rotate:

~~~
diff -r 955858ef7829 worlds/empty.world
--- a/worlds/empty.world	Fri Jan 27 17:57:05 2017 +0000
+++ b/worlds/empty.world	Fri Jan 27 11:14:29 2017 -0800
@@ -9,5 +9,10 @@
     <include>
       <uri>model://ground_plane</uri>
     </include>
+    <!-- A ground plane -->
+    <include>
+      <pose>0 10 0 0 0 1.57</pose>
+      <uri>model://vrc_driving_terrain</uri>
+    </include>
   </world>
 </sdf>
diff -r 955858ef7829 worlds/heightmap_dem.world
--- a/worlds/heightmap_dem.world	Fri Jan 27 17:57:05 2017 +0000
+++ b/worlds/heightmap_dem.world	Fri Jan 27 11:14:29 2017 -0800
@@ -6,6 +6,7 @@
       <uri>model://sun</uri>
     </include>
     <model name="heightmap">
+      <pose>0 10 0 0 0 1.57</pose>
       <static>true</static>
       <link name="link">
         <collision name="collision">

~~~
